changeuuid.description: A globally unique identifier for the change of the station information

stationuuid.description: A globally unique identifier for the station

url.description: The stream URL provided by the user

url_resolved.description: An automatically "resolved" stream URL. Things resolved are playlists (M3U/PLS/ASX...), HTTP redirects (Code 301/302). This link is especially usefull if you use this API from a platform that is not able to do a resolve on its own (e.g. JavaScript in browser) or you just don't want to invest the time in decoding playlists yourself

homepage.description: URL to the homepage of the stream, so you can direct the user to a page with more information about the stream

favicon.description: URL to an icon or picture that represents the stream. (PNG, JPG)

tags.description: Tags of the stream with more information about it

country.description: DEPRECATED: use countrycode instead, full name of the country. Currently it is autogenerated from the countrycode

countrycode.description: Official countrycodes as in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2

state.description: Full name of the entity where the station is located inside the country

language.description: Languages that are spoken in this stream

languagecodes.description: Languages that are spoken in this stream by code ISO 639-2/B

votes.description: Number of votes for this station. This number is by server and only ever increases. It will never be reset to 0

lastchangetime.description: Last time when the stream information was changed in the database

lastchangetime_iso8601.description: Last time when the stream information was changed in the database

codec.description: The codec of this stream recorded at the last check

bitrate.description: The bitrate of this stream recorded at the last check

hls.description: Mark if this stream is using HLS distribution or non-HLS

lastcheckok.description: The current online/offline state of this stream. This is a value calculated from multiple measure points in the internet. The test servers are located in different countries. It is a majority vote

lastchecktime.description: The last time when any radio-browser server checked the online state of this stream

lastchecktime_iso8601.description: The last time when any radio-browser server checked the online state of this stream

lastcheckoktime.description: The last time when the stream was checked for the online status with a positive result

lastcheckoktime_iso8601.description: The last time when the stream was checked for the online status with a positive result

lastlocalchecktime.description: The last time when this server checked the online state and the metadata of this stream

lastlocalchecktime_iso8601.description: The last time when this server checked the online state and the metadata of this stream

clicktimestamp.description: The time of the last click recorded for this stream

clicktimestamp_iso8601.description: The time of the last click recorded for this stream

clicktrend.description: The difference of the clickcounts within the last 2 days. Posivite values mean an increase, negative a decrease of clicks

ssl_error.description: 0 means no error, 1 means that there was an ssl error while connecting to the stream url

geo_lat.description: Latitude on earth where the stream is located

geo_long.description: Longitude on earth where the stream is located

has_extended_info.description: Is true, if the stream owner does provide extended information as HTTP headers which override the information in the database
